divs: sighting detailsdriving home from work, harper\14 mile area. red blinking light just sse, very low, almost over talbot trails, know there is no tower in that area. as approaching i turn down talbot for better view, drive down maybe 4 houses and start to make out a defined structure, very small, silent, light color, hovering maybe 100-150 feet above ground level. then object begins to move north 2-3 streets, suddenly white light appears with red. i turn car around back towards harper, as i arrive at harper\talbot object has moved very quickly and is now nw of quinn\harper still red blinking with constant white and has maintained ridiculously low altitude. this was under the curtain of the ang base's airspace, and i checked aviation charts for new tower notams in that area, there were none.
Summary: Red Blinking Light, Low Over Talbot Trails
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
trends: There have been no other sightings in Clinton Township
This sighting has never been favorited.
